name: threat-intelligence-platform
label: Threat Intelligence Platform
description: Threat Intelligence Platform combines several threat intelligence sources to provide in-depth insights on threat hosts and attack infrastructure.This connector facilitates automated operations to pull off real-time host configuration analysis to come up with actionable threat intelligence that is vital in detection, mitigation, and remediation.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL of the Threat Intelligence Platform connector to access the connector website.
fields.tooltip: URL of the Threat Intelligence Platform connector to access the connector website.
fields.name: server

fields.title: API key
fields.description: Provide API token, used for user authentication.
fields.tooltip: Provide API token, used for user authentication.
fields.name: api_key

operations.title: Get Domain Infrastructure Analysis Details
operations.description: Retrieved information for a given domain name, get a collection of its web, mail, and name servers as well as its known subdomains. For each infrastructure entry, find out its IP address, geolocation, and subnetwork information.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.
parameters.tooltip: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.

operations.title: Get SSL Certificate Chain Details
operations.description: Retrieved information for a given domain name, get detailed information about its SSL Certificate and the complete SSL Certificate chain.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.
parameters.tooltip: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.

operations.title: Get SSL Configuration Analysis Details
operations.description: Retrieved information for a given domain name, establish and test SSL connection to the host and analyze how it is configured - to detect common configuration issues potentially leading to vulnerabilities.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.
parameters.tooltip: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.

operations.title: Get Domain Malware Check Details
operations.description: Retrieved information for a given domain name,check if it is considered to be dangerous in different security data sources. Dangerous domains could be related to a malware distribution network or host a malicious code.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.
parameters.tooltip: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.

operations.title: Get Connected Domains Details
operations.description: Retrieve a list of domain names resolving to a given domain name, including subdomains. Make sure the website does not share the IP address with malicious domains, as that may result in over blocking â€“ a situation when a blocked malicious site also blocks other sites with the same IP. Research the infrastructure of connected domains.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.
parameters.tooltip: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.

operations.title: Get Domain Reputation  Details
operations.description: Evaluate a domain's reputation based on numerous security data sources as well as on an instant host's audit procedure. For a given domain name or IPv4 address, collect and evaluate over 120 parameters and calculate the resulting reputation score.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.
parameters.tooltip: Required domain name whose geolocation data needs to be retrieved.

parameters.title: Mode
parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Select the type of query that is how you want to perform  'fast' or 'full'. Only select test codes will runâ€”i.e., 62 WHOIS Domain Status, 82 Malware Databases Check, 87 SSL certificate validity, and 93 WHOIS Domain Checkâ€”while other tests and data collectors will be disabled and in full mode all tests will be performed, similar to what the TIP GUI displays.
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of query that is how you want to perform  'fast' or 'full'. Only select test codes will runâ€”i.e., 62 WHOIS Domain Status, 82 Malware Databases Check, 87 SSL certificate validity, and 93 WHOIS Domain Checkâ€”while other tests and data collectors will be disabled and in full mode all tests will be performed, similar to what the TIP GUI displays.

parameters.title: Query Type
parameters.name: query_type
parameters.description: Select the type of query that is how you want to perform get domain operation the v2 API version differs from the v1 only in the output format.
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of query that is how you want to perform get domain operation the v2 API version differs from the v1 only in the output format.
